vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H6068H', 'matchingForm': 'עֲנָתוֹת', 'stepTransliteration': 'a.na.tot', 'gloss': 'Anathoth', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.7.8', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞拿突', '_es_Gloss': 'Anathoth', '_zh_Gloss': '亚拿突'}, {'strongNumber': 'H6068I', 'matchingForm': 'עֲנָתוֹת', 'stepTransliteration': 'a.na.tot', 'gloss': 'Anathoth', '_searchResultRange': 'Neh.10.19', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞拿突', '_es_Gloss': 'Anathoth', '_zh_Gloss': '亚拿突'}, {'strongNumber': 'H6069', 'matchingForm': 'עַנְּתֹתִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'an.ne.to.ti', 'gloss': 'Anathoth', '_searchResultRange': '2Sam.23.27-Jer.29.27@Josh.21.18-Jer.32.9', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞拿突人', '_es_Gloss': 'Anathothita', '_zh_Gloss': '亚拿突人'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: an.to.ti (עַנְּתֹתִי "Anathoth" H6069)
§ Anathoth = "answers to prayer"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) son of Becher and grandson of Benjamin
2) one of the heads of the people who signed the covenant with Nehemiah
n pr loc
3) a city of Benjamin allotted to the priest; located approximately 3 miles (5 km) from Jerusalem; birthplace of the prophet Jeremiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ciudad; para los levitas; territorio de Benjamín; (b)   hijo de Béquer; tribu de Benjamín; (c)   hombre; post exílico \habitante de Anatot
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞拿突 这个字在原文的意思是 「禱告蒙應允」
陽性專有名詞
1) 比結的兒子, 便雅憫的孫子 ( 代上 7:6,8)
2) 跟尼希米立約的百姓, 其中一位領袖 (尼10:19)
專有名詞 地名
3) 便雅憫境內的城市, 分給祭司為業;
距耶路撒冷約有 3 哩 (5 公里) 左右;
先知耶利米的出生地
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚拿突 这个字在原文的意思是 「祷告蒙应允」
阳性专有名词
1) 比结的儿子, 便雅悯的孙子 ( 代上 7:6,8)
2) 跟尼希米立约的百姓, 其中一位领袖 (尼10:19)
专有名词 地名
3) 便雅悯境内的城市, 分给祭司为业;
距耶路撒冷约有 3 哩 (5 公里) 左右;
先知耶利米的出生地

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.8;
son of: Becher (H1071);
brother of: Zemirah (H2160), Joash (H3135), Eliezer (H0461I), Elioenai (H0454I), Omri (H6018H), Jeremoth (H3406H), Abijah (H0029K) and Alemeth (H5964H)
§ Anathoth = "answers to prayer"
n pr m
1) son of Becher and grandson of Benjamin
2) one of the heads of the people who signed the covenant with Nehemiah
n pr loc
3) a city of Benjamin allotted to the priest; located approximately 3 miles (5 km) from Jerusalem; birthplace of the prophet Jeremiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.19
